import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor, GradientBoostingRegressor
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
from lightgbm import LGBMRegressor
from catboost import CatBoostRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error, r2_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation_df = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Separate features and target
X_train = train_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_train = train_df['SalePrice']
X_test = test_df.drop(['Id'], axis=1)
X_val = validation_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_val = validation_df['SalePrice']

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Handle missing values: fill numerical with median, categorical with mode
for col in numerical_columns:
    if X_train[col].isnull().any():
        X_train[col].fillna(X_train[col].median(), inplace=True)
        X_test[col].fillna(X_test[col].median(), inplace=True)
        X_val[col].fillna(X_val[col].median(), inplace=True)

for col in categorical_columns:
    if X_train[col].isnull().any():
        X_train[col].fillna(X_train[col].mode()[0], inplace=True)
        X_test[col].fillna(X_test[col].mode()[0], inplace=True)
        X_val[col].fillna(X_val[col].mode()[0], inplace=True)

# Feature engineering
# 1. Create year-related features
X_train['Age'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearBuilt']
X_train['RemodAge'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearRemodAdd']
X_test['Age'] = X_test['YrSold'] - X_test['YearBuilt']

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor, GradientBoostingRegressor
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
from lightgbm import LGBMRegressor
from catboost import CatBoostRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error, r2_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation_df = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Separate features and target
X_train = train_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_train = train_df['SalePrice']
X_test = test_df.drop(['Id'], axis=1)
X_val = validation_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_val = validation_df['SalePrice']

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Handle missing values: fill numerical with median, categorical with mode
for col in numerical_columns:
    if X_train[col].isnull().any():
        X_train[col].fillna(X_train[col].median(), inplace=True)
        X_test[col].fillna(X_test[col].median(), inplace=True)
        X_val[col].fillna(X_val[col].median(), inplace=True)

for col in categorical_columns:
    if X_train[col].isnull().any():
        mode_val = X_train[col].mode()
        if len(mode_val) == 0:
            mode_val = 'Unknown'
        X_train[col].fillna(mode_val[0], inplace=True)
        X_test[col].fillna(mode_val[0], inplace=True)
        X_val[col].fillna(mode_val[0], inplace=True)

# Feature engineering
# 1. Create year-related features
X_train['Age'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearBuilt']
X_train['RemodAge'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor, GradientBoostingRegressor
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
from lightgbm import LGBMRegressor
from catboost import CatBoostRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error, r2_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation_df = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Separate features and target
X_train = train_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_train = train_df['SalePrice']
X_test = test_df.drop(['Id'], axis=1)
X_val = validation_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_val = validation_df['SalePrice']

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Remove year columns before any processing
year_cols = ['YearBuilt', 'YearRemodAdd', 'YrSold']
X_train = X_train.drop(year_cols, axis=1)
X_test = X_test.drop(year_cols, axis=1)
X_val = X_val.drop(year_cols, axis=1)

# Handle missing values: fill numerical with median, categorical with mode
for col in numerical_columns:
    if X_train[col].isnull().any():
        X_train[col].fillna(X_train[col].median(), inplace=True)
        X_test[col].fillna(X_test[col].median(), inplace=True)
        X_val[col].fillna(X_val[col].median(), inplace=True)

for col in categorical_columns:
    if X_train[col].isnull().any():
        mode_val = X_train[col].mode()
        if len(mode_val) == 0:
            mode_val = 'Unknown'
        X_train[col].fillna(mode_val[0], inplace=True)
        X_test[col].fillna(mode_val[0], inplace=True)

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline

from lightgbm import LGBMRegressor
from catboost import CatBoostRegressor

test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor, GradientBoostingRegressor
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
from lightgbm import LGBMRegressor
from catboost import CatBoostRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error, r2_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

# Load data

test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation_df = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Separate features and target

y_train = train_df['SalePrice']

y_val = validation_df['SalePrice']

numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()
